title: MasterCAM X8 with Add-ons
description:
1. Install MasterCAM with all update ("mastercamX8-update4.exe" from "Update" folder), select HASP or NetHASP SIM Type;
2. Unpack archive "_SolidSQUAD_.zip" to <mastercam X8 progdir> (by default "C:Program FilesmcamX8") and overwrite original ones;
3. Depending on selected SIM Type during installation run appropriate dump: "mcam_X5_X7_hasp_SSQ.reg" for SIM Type > HASP or "mcam_X5_X7_nethasp_SSQ.reg" (this dump has got extended functionality!) for SIM Type > NetHASP and confirm to add info in Windows Registry;
4. Install emulator: depending on Windows architecture (32bit or 64bit) run "mkinstall_x86.exe" or "mkinstall_x64.exe" respectively from "..crkemul" folder, press key [1] and wait until the driver installation, a "Drivers installed successfully" message will be displayed. On request "Windows can't verify the publisher of this driver software" select "Install this driver software anyway";
5. If setup is succesfull you have to see new system devices:
Device Manager -> System devices -> Virtual USB Multikey;
Device Manager -> Universal Serial Bus controllers -> SafeNet Inc. HASP key and SafeNet Inc. USB Key.
6. Reboot OS;
7. Depending on selected SIM Type, in mastercam program folder run:
SIM Type HASP - HaspX.exe -> Read and OK;
SIM Type NetHASP - NHaspX.exe -> Select NetHASP and Local -> Read and OK.
8. Run MasterCAM.

Add-ons for MasterCAM X8:
Mastercam X8 Art
Mastercam X8 Wire Power
Mastercam X8 CATIA Translator
CATIA V4-V5 translator V4.9.1 with MBD for Mastercam X8
Moldplus V10.7 for Mastercam X8
ProDrill V4 MR2 for Mastercam X8
Verisurf Tools for Mastercam X8
X+ for Mastercam X8
MachSim for Mastercam X8
Moldplus Server 5.4
Mastercam X8 Sample Files

That's all, enjoy!
-------------------------------------------------------------------
NEW EMULATOR NOT REQUIRED digitally signed drivers
